data.eml:eml: Bothrocara nyx: a new species of eelpout (Perciformes: Zoarcidae) from the Bering Sea.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stevenson, Duane E., Anderson, M. Eric (2005): Bothrocara nyx: a new species of eelpout (Perciformes: Zoarcidae) from the Bering Sea. Zootaxa 1094: 53-64, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:98A96DC0-0F57-4C1C-B3F6-B28E2B1D7D90
